title: Bookkeeper/Accountant/Google Sheets
description:
Our company is excited to have an opening for a new role!

We are seeking an Accountant/Bookkeeper with financial education or experience and great communication skills. This role is ideal for someone who has great analytical skills and a keen interest in accounting practices. Also, knows how to work with formulas and spreadsheets. We value people with great written and spoken English, attention to detail, and organizational skills.

This is a casual role for up to 10 hours per month initially. Hours are flexible but we are looking for someone who will be available to get on a Zoom call from time to time in EST US Time after 6 pm. Experience with accounting, understanding balance sheets and P&L is required. The company may offer growth opportunities depending on performance. Full training is provided to meet current needs, but you’ll be expected to take it beyond this.

Key Responsibilities: - Monthly and Weekly P&L statements - Monthly ads to sales conversions report - Monthly expense breakdown analysis - Quarterly BAS statements - Cash Flow forecast - Return Per employee - Assistance in Preparation of Tax Return - Other relevant statements as they arise

Here are the major requirements: - High Proficiency in English - Minimum 3 years experience previously - Education in Finance/Accounting - Must be willing to learn Australian Accounting and Tax - Be able to do Bank reconciliations, Profit and Loss Statements - Must be Proficient in Google Spreadsheets and advanced formulas - Great communication skills within a team - Stable power + internet connection (proof) + fast PC/Laptop - Ability to go on Zoom 6 -10 pm EST (New York) - Efficient and reliable worker - Able to follow instructions to precision - Committed - Strong analytical and numerical skills - Exceptional attention to detail (!!!>> When filling out the form, put your postcode as #9999, DO NOT put your real postcode

We Offer: A vibrant and supportive team environment. Opportunities for professional growth and development. Pay: provide us with your hourly rate as in the beginning you’ll be paid per hour Remote work - work from home Growth Opportunities and Full Training To apply, please fill out this form

title: Desktop Engineering
description:
Project Description: Coremont provides integrated front to back office services to investment managers and financial institutions and is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority in the United Kingdom. Coremont's service offering encompasses the full asset management life-cycle, including a portfolio management system, risk analysis, operations (trade processing, fund accounting and treasury services), compliance support and investor relations services. The business spun out from Brevan Howard Asset Management (one of the world's leading absolute return/hedge fund managers) in 2018 and Brevan Howard remains a key client. Coremont employs over 200 staff, with offices in London, Hong Kong, New York, Connecticut and the Channel Islands. It is led by a team of highly experienced finance professionals across multiple disciplines with a platform that is considered an industry leader in trading analytics, risk analysis and operational robustness. This job opening represents an exciting opportunity to join a rapidly growing business with institutional backing and a proven track record in delivering a suite of financial services to a market-leading standard. The successful individual will be able to combine their industry experience with a vision for further development in a dynamic and supportive environment. The Infrastructure (desktop) Engineering team based is primarily responsible for the maintenance and engineering of the firm's global desktop and VDI environment, along with various on premise and cloud based end user services.

Responsibilities: • Software Packaging & rollout, with required Support documentation & knowledge transfer • Development, configuration & support of On-premise and Cloud based End User Services (e.g Microsoft 365) o Including application, endpoint and mobile device management • Provide escalated support & troubleshooting of VMWare Horizon VDI environment • Active Directory & Entra ID configuration, maintenance & administration • Provide 3rd line support for the Desktop environment, applications and hardware • Vulnerability & Software update management for Microsoft & 3rd party applications, OS & hardware • Manage, monitor & maintain file transfer services for internal & External clients • Desktop environment lifecycle development & automation • Proactive performance & reliability analysis, leading to continuous improvement of the Desktop environment • Collaborate with Internal & External Customers/Vendors to pro-actively obtain information regarding applications for packaging, problem solving or escalation.

Mandatory Skills Description: • Packaging experience with MECM/Intune • Experience and strong knowledge of Linux • PowerShell scripting • Advanced VDI Administration & Troubleshooting • Advanced Active directory administration including GPO, Intune • Good understanding of control principles - Release, Change Management, etc • Used to working to best practice methodologies such as ITIL • Microsoft Office Suite 2016/365. • Market data applications. • Excellent understanding of build and client distribution architectures (MECM)

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: • VMWare Horizon • Other scripting languages • Basic T-SQL query experience • Microsoft 365 services deployment & engineering • Microsoft Azure foundational knowledge • Support of Configuration Manager • Chocolatey

Languages: English: C1 Advanced

title: BI Analyst
description:
Vaga: Professional, BI Analyst I, Training and Quality Somos fanáticos por nossas pessoas! E demonstramos isso oferecendo uma cultura de pertencimento; caminhos claros para o desenvolvimento de carreira; programas de apoio profissional, coaching e mentoria, uma rede global de amigos e colegas que podem te suportar e mais! (Tipo, muito mais.). Quer estar em uma multinacional que é Great Place to Work, apoiar as melhores marcas do mercado, inovar e mudar o mundo – tudo ao mesmo tempo em que estabelece conexões reais com as pessoas e desenvolve sua carreira? Seja um #gamechanger

Principais responsabilidades: Análises Estatísticas: Realizar análises de performance operacional, correlacionando indicadores de eficiência e eficácia. Desenvolvimento de Estudos Preditivos: Criar modelos que prevejam comportamentos futuros, como quedas em resultados ou risco de attrition. Clusterização: Identificar e mensurar resultados de ações clusterizadas, segmentando as operações para otimizar o desempenho. Sazonalidade: Analisar sazonalidades e seu impacto nos resultados operacionais, fornecendo insumos para a melhoria contínua dos processos críticos.

Se você: • Tem experiência na função; • É um amante de tecnologia e inovação; • Conhecimento avançado em SQL, Python, Power BI e Estatística. Desejáveis: Certificação Green Belt. Formação em Ciência de Dados ou áreas correlatas.

O que oferecemos: • Oportunidade de carreira e desenvolvimento; • Plataforma online com diversos cursos disponíveis; • Seguro de Vida; • Vale-transporte; • Vale-refeição; Vale-alimentação; • Assistência odontológica; • Assistência médica.

Todas as nossas vagas são destinadas para pessoas com deficiência
